entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023
